:py:mod:`qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.cvxpy_utils`
=====================================================

.. py:module:: qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.cvxpy_utils

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Created on Wed Jun  1 10:39:15 2016

   @author: Peter Wittek



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.cvxpy_utils.solve_with_cvxpy
   qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.cvxpy_utils.convert_to_cvxpy



.. py:function:: solve_with_cvxpy(sdp, solverparameters=None)

   Helper function to convert the SDP problem to CVXPY
   and call the solver, and parse the output.

   :param sdp: The SDP relaxation to be solved.
   :type sdp: :class:`ncpol2sdpa.sdp`.


.. py:function:: convert_to_cvxpy(sdp)

   Convert an SDP relaxation to a CVXPY problem.

   :param sdp: The SDP relaxation to convert.
   :type sdp: :class:`ncpol2sdpa.sdp`.

   :returns: :class:`cvxpy.Problem`.
